name: Format\CornerMask
description: The object for creating rounded corners.

properties.name: bottomLeft
properties.description: A Boolean that indicates whether the bottom-left corner should be masked.

properties.name: bottomRight
properties.description: A Boolean that indicates whether the bottom-right corner should be masked.

properties.name: curve
properties.description:
The type of curve to use for rendering the mask’s corner. 
Valid values:

properties.name: radius
properties.description: A supported unit or number that describes the radius of the corners in points. Corner radius cannot exceed half the component width or height, whichever is smaller.

properties.name: topLeft
properties.description: A Boolean that indicates whether the top-left corner should be masked.

properties.name: topRight
properties.description: A Boolean that indicates whether the top-right corner should be masked.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of mask. The value is always corners.
